title: Nextcloud
description: A safe home for all your data. Access & share your files, calendars, contacts, mail & more from any device, on your terms.
note: Deploys a NextCloud instance connected to a Postgres database.

env.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the Postgres root user.

title: Dokuwiki
description: A simple to use and highly versatile Open Source wiki software that doesn't require a database.
